title: O. April Fools' Problem (hard)
statement: The plans for HC2 are rather far-fetched: we are just over 500 000 days away from HC2 3387, for example, and accordingly we are planning to have a couple hundred thousand problems in that edition (we hope that programming contests will become wildly more popular). The marmots need to get to work, and they could use a good plan...
inputSpecification: Same as the medium version, but the limits have changed: 1 ≤ k ≤ n ≤ 500 000.
name: April Fools' Problem (hard)
